type.name: standard
type.summary:
Directional Movement Index (DMI) and Average Directional Movement Index (ADX) is a measure of price directional movement. It includes upward and downward indicators, and is often used to measure strength of trend.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
type.returns: Time series of ADX and Plus/Minus Directional values.

type.name: increment
type.summary:
Get the next incremental Average Directional Movement Index (ADX) values.
See documentation for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
Input values for increment, see AdxInput class.

type.name: input
type.summary:
Input values for incremental Average Directional Movement Index (ADX).
See documentation for more information.
type.property: ADX value at beginning of `lookbackPeriods` window.
